QuestData.Title: Bravo Company Field Kit: Chloroform
QuestData.Description: The first part of this mission is all covert ops, $n. To that end, we need to be able to incapacitate the enemy without making any sounds. To do that we're going to need chloroform.$B$BThe muckdwellers at the bottom of Lake Everstill hold chloroform in their glands. I'm going to need you to go underwater and recover muckdweller glands. Think you can handle it?$B$BCome back to me once you've recovered enough glands.$B$BWhere's the lake you ask? Open your eyes, dummy. Directly west.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect. Those orcs won't know what hit 'em - literally. I'll need a few minutes to get these in working order and then I'll put them in the Bravo Company field kit.
